thread.title: UN approves Syria ceasefire, but who will listen?

title: UN approves Syria ceasefire, but who will listen?
text:
UN approves Syria ceasefire, but who will listen? 8:39pm IST - 01:28 
The U.N. Security Council approved on Saturday a 30-day truce across Syria to allow humanitarian aid to penetrate the worst-hit areas, but reports of persistent fighting continue to pour in along multiple fronts. Matthew Larotonda reports ▲ Hide Transcript ▶ View Transcript 
The U.N. Security Council approved on Saturday a 30-day truce across Syria to allow humanitarian aid to penetrate the worst-hit areas, but reports of persistent fighting continue to pour in along multiple fronts.
